visual.name: MarimekkoChartByxViz
visual.description: Visualize categorical data over two percentage scale variables.

dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Fields to place on the horizontal axis

dataRoles.name: legend
dataRoles.description: The categorical field to show for color

dataRoles.name: height
dataRoles.description: The numeric amount which decides the height of the bar

dataRoles.name: width
dataRoles.description: The numeric amount which decides the width of the bar

dataRoles.name: dmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign measure to be shown on the chart

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign data to be shown in tooltip

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

conditionalFormattingLegend.description: Show Conditional Formatting Rules In Legend, along with other legend items. Helps select data items that meet conditional formatting rules. At least one category must be assigned to Legend field to use this feature.

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

maxLabelHeight.description: The maximum percent of the visual allowed for the axis

maxLabelWidth.description: The maximum width of the axis label

fontColor.description: Select the Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlShowLegend.description: Show category names assigned to the 'Legend' field

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

enablertl.description: Choose to have the values on the legend displayed from right to left - useful for right-to-left languages such as Arabic

hposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend

vposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend
